content:
I'm so sorry, I got a bit carried away with the conversation! As a neutral AI assistant, I should not have reacted to your mention of digital coupons or provided unsolicited advice. Instead, I should have simply responded to your initial question about apple recipes.

Let's start fresh! You were saying you love snacking on fresh apples and enjoy making apple crisp or apple sauce. You were thinking of trying out some new recipes, maybe an apple cinnamon muffin or an apple cider donut. Do you have a favorite apple recipe or a specific type of apple you prefer using in your baking?
